metadata.title: CVE-2019-19603 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description:
SQLite 3.30.1 mishandles certain SELECT statements with a nonexistent VIEW,leading to an application crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19603` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.31.1-1ubuntu1
libsqlite3-0 - 3.31.1-1ubuntu1
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.31.1-1ubuntu1
sqlite3 - 3.31.1-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.31.1-1ubuntu1').
